thread.section_title: Pacific Bay Watch Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pacific Bay Watch | www.pacificbaywatch.com
thread.title: Paul Gillespie
thread.title_full: Pacific Bay Watch reviewed by Paul Gillespie

author: Paul Gillespie
title: Paul Gillespie
text: Finally found a watch dealer who knows how to make a watch purchase work out for the buyer. I am more then completely satisfied with my watch, and customer service, also would strongly recommend this seller/dealer to anyone. I am so happy with this watch and the seller/dealer service, that I am considering a second purchase in the very near future, and just want to say "THANK YOU" again.
